availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George C. Slaughter (Jefferson County, Kentucky, merchant and notary public)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, merchant and notary public. Kentucky native. Married to Julia A. Redding Slaughter in Shelby County, Kentucky, on November 26, 1844. Father of Edward Slaughter, Clayton Slaughter, James Slaughter, and Ella Slaughter. Hardware merchant in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Assistant to the United States Internal Revenue Assessor in Jefferson County in 1862. Notary public in Jefferson County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 2, p. 166B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 6, p. 597B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Shelby County Marriages, Film #000259289.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994041, Jefferson County Deaths, p. 225.
